task.summary: Painting materials are now hooked properly to GridManager
Mostly working Excise remaining line renderers Make characters so it doesn't hitch Get new textures
Fixed layering issue with the Quad trail
very basic splat in need to add layering for splatting need to add particle effect
Menu in Game now cycles through the five colors correctly
Idle state now lets players move but invulnerable
Issues with round restarting not actually resetting the nodes and colors
